DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Risk Cognitive Impairment After Surgical Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator conduct pilot study compare cognitive outcome 60 Veterans severe aortic valve stenosis schedule undergo either transcatheter aortic valve replacement ( TAVR ) surgical aortic valve replacement ( SAVR ) Minneapolis VA Health Care System . Participants administer short battery cognitive test three month TAVR SAVR over/up two year study period .
